roleset.name: giving in, surrendering

example.name: Arg0
example.text: Ironically one of the big winners is the Conservative Party , thanks to the demise of their Lib Dem brethren whose capitulation has allowed them to remain fairly stable .

example.name: arg1
example.text: The political elite is genuinely alarmed at what capitulation to southern demands might encourage.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, capitulate-v.01. Corresponds to VNcls acquiesce-95.
